snippet: By publicly endorsing same-sex marriage in a television interview, the president took a definitive stand on one of the most contentious and politically charged social issues of the day.
abstract: Pres Obama, speaking in a network television interview, endorses same-sex marriage, taking a definitive stand after nearly two years on one of the most contentious and politically charged social issues of the day; announcement comes after Vice Pres Joseph R Biden Jr all but forced Obama's hand by embracing the idea of same-sex unions in a television interview; public support for same-sex marriage is growing.
